CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "Just Missed - The Ammon Junior Basketball team went all the way to the finals in Parks and Recreation basketball tournament before dropping a close decision to West View last week. Members of the team are, left to right, front row: Harold Hill, C. Biffens, D. Bailey, James Brock and V. White. Back row: Coach Charlie Betts, W. Walker, J. Wallace and H. Williams.  Missing from photo is Harold Williams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ammon Junior Basketball team, first row from left: Harold Hill, C. Biffens, D. Bailey, James Brock, and V. White; second row: coach Charlie Betts, W. Walker, J. Wallace, and H. Williams, another version
